mapper.select:
select * from t_user a,employee b where b.emp_id=a.emp_id
and user_name like '%${userName}%'
and user_password like '%${userPassword}%'
select distinct d.* from t_user_position a,t_position b,t_position_power c,t_power d where a.user_id=#{uid} and c.position_id=a.position_id and d.power_id=c.power_id
mapper.delete: delete a,b from t_user a,employee b where a.user_id=#{uid} and a.emp_id=b.emp_id
mapper.select: select * from t_user a,employee b,tb_deliveryspot c where b.emp_id=a.emp_id AND c.deliveryspot_id=a.deliveryspot_id AND a.user_id=#{uid}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user a,employee b SET a.user_name=#{user.userName},a.user_password=#{user.userPassword},a.deliveryspot_id=#{user.deliveryspot.deliveryspotId},b.emp_name=#{employee.empName},b.emp_sex=#{employee.empSex},b.emp_address=#{employee.empAddress},b.emp_tel=#{employee.empTel},b.emp_workTime=#{employee.empWorkTime},b.emp_salary=#{employee.empSalary},b.emp_cardId=#{employee.empCardId},b.deliveryspot_id=#{employee.deliveryspot.deliveryspotId},b.emp_fiag=#{employee.empFiag} where b.emp_id=a.emp_id AND a.user_id=#{user.userId}
